gui command¶

usage: ada-hub gui [-h] [-e EMULATOR] {list-themes} ...

Named Arguments¶

-e, --emulator

Start the Ada Hub application with the Sense-Emu backend.

Default: False

GUI Specific Commands¶

gui_command

Possible choices: list-themes

Sub-commands specific to information or manipulation of the Graphical User Interface?

Sub-commands:¶

list-themes¶

Print out a list of strings that contain a list of acceptable theme names, and then quits. (Useful for if you want to specify a theme in your program-opening commands

ada-hub gui list-themes [-h]
